extensionDescription.message: Bulk close tabs with matching URLs or names.

closeButton.description: action button to do the closing

closeButtonTooltip.description: instruction on inline single tab close button

notFoundAlert.description: indicates that no matching tabs were found

pinnedTabsNote.description: highlights that some tabs were not selected due to pin settings.

pinnedTabsWarning.description: highlights that pinned tabs will be closed due to pin settings.

mainTabUrl.description: The main tab selecting the URL search method.

mainTabTitle.description: The main tab selecting the Title search method.
The main tab selecting the Duplicate search method.

searchQueryPrompt.description: The prompt for the search query.

caseSensitiveTitleMatchLabel.description: The form label asking if matches should be case sensitive.

allWindowsMatchLabel.description: Query asking to search all windows (active) or just the current window

dontClosePinnedTabs.description: query if pinned tabs should be closed (if pin settings is ask)

noDuplicates.description: Report indicating no duplicates found to close.
Report indicating no duplicates found to close.

unicodeFailureWarning.message: I'm trying to match unicode searches and suggestions. If its not working for you please submit a bug with examples
unicodeFailureWarning.description: link to issues because the unicode stuff is probably broken.

matchedSummary.description: Summarise the result of the query with space for pinned tabs warning.
